June 28, 2022 - The brand logo must be legible: the primary text of a logo should be at least 38 pt (Arial regular or equivalent size). Otherwise, the smallest text of a logo should be at least 20 pt. The logo image must contrast well with the background image; a minimum of 3:1 contrast ratio is required.
